Welcome to GhostDetector alpha v0.1
 ---------------------------------- 
 ABOUT AND ISSUES 
 ---------------------------------- 
 
 Magnetic Field Detector
 -----------------------
 Paranormal Inversigators theorise that
 spirits may procude larger than background
 magnetic fields (MF). Normal background MF
 is usually between 10uT to 70uT. Spikes 
 may be caused by any device that produces
 large MFs like magnets, washing machines
 or simply spikes in the Earths MF.

 If the MF detector spikes to over 170uT
 without explanation, this may be caused
 by local spirit activity
 It is recommended to put your device on
 Airplane mode to reduce MF interference

 Static Motion Detector
 -----------------------
 The Motion detector is set to alert you
 if the device is moved at all.
 Place the device on a steady surface and
 press the Motion Detector button to start
 This can be useful to place know to have
 spirit activity where objects are being
 shaken or moved

 Known Issues and To Come:
 Sensor at time of writing only changes
 screen colour. This will be updated to ommit
 a high pitched tone. Motion Detector starts
 as soon as button pressed. This will be
 updated to include a timer to allow user
 to move away without setting off device.

 Ghost Talk
 -----------------------
 To see if any spirits have the ability
 to manipulate speech, GhostTalk is available
 for communication. Simply call the spirit
 and ask a question. Then push the Speak
 button. The system will then randomly
 pull text and feed back. User interpritation
 is required.

 Know Issues and To Come:
 Words are limited to 830 common words with
 no names. They also feed from a string array
 inside the class. Updates will include
 words input from a Dictionary or Database
 and list will be updated to the class. Preferebly
 this should pull from the userDictionary.
 I have considered putting in an algorithm
 to produce sentances properly, but this 
 is probably not required.

 Maps
 -----------------------
 You can also go to maps and input details
 about your find in a specific location
 for future reference

 Know issues and To Come:
 Unable to save details at this time
 Unable to find location so this has to
 be done manually by Latitude and Longitiude.
 Validation has not been done for Lat and Lon!!!
 The system will probably crash if a string in input.
 Preferebly a long click on the
 map would give the user the ability
 to insert the details and save to a DB.
